Package eus.klimu.users.api

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
eus.klimu.users.api.UserController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
Create, update, delete and get information for the AppUsers. They save the information about the users of the application. Takes care of all the CRUD methods, working with the database through an internal Service.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      @GetMapping(value="/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> getUser​(@PathVariable long id)

      Fetch an AppUser based on its ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the AppUser that is going to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserByUsername

      @GetMapping(value="/username/{username}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> getUserByUsername​(@PathVariable java.lang.String username)

      Fetch an AppUser based on its username.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/username/{username}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the AppUser that is going to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserByChatId

      @GetMapping("/chatId/{chatId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> getUserByChatId​(@PathVariable java.lang.String chatId)

      Fetch an AppUser based on its telegramId.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/chatId/{chatId}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The telegramId of the AppUser that is going to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserFromToken

      @GetMapping(value="/from-token/{token}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> getUserFromToken​(@PathVariable java.lang.String token)

      Get an AppUser from a token.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/from-token/{token}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      token - The token the AppUser that is going to be fetched from.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was generated or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUsersWithNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/{locationId}/{typeId}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<AppUser>> getUsersWithNotifications​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long locationId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long typeId)

      Get a list of AppUsers that have a localized notification configured.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/{locationId}/{typeId}

      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      locationId - The ID of the location that is going to be used on the query.
      typeId - The ID of the notification type that is going to be used on the query.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUsers were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createUser

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> createUser​(@RequestBody AppUserDTO user)

      Save a new AppUser on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/create

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      user - The AppUser that is going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was created or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createAllUsers

      @PostMapping(value="/create/all", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<AppUser>> createAllUsers​(@RequestBody java.util.List<AppUser> users)

      Save an X amount of AppUsers on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/create/all

      • Consumes: application/json
      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      users - The list of AppUsers that are going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUsers were created or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • addLocalizedAlertToUser

      @PostMapping("/add/{chatId}/{channel}/{locationId}/{typeId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> addLocalizedAlertToUser​(@PathVariable java.lang.String chatId, @PathVariable java.lang.String channel, @PathVariable long locationId, @PathVariable long typeId)

      Add a new localized notification to an AppUser.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/add/{chatId}/{channel}/{locationId}/{typeId}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The telegramId of the user that is going to be updated.
      channel - The name of the channel that the notification is going to be created for.
      locationId - The ID of the location for the notification.
      typeId - The ID of the notification type for the notification.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the localized notification was created or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • setChatId

      @PostMapping(value="/set/chatId/{username}/{chatId}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> setChatId​(@PathVariable java.lang.String username, @PathVariable java.lang.String chatId)

      Set the chat ID of a user based on the username.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/set/chatId/{username}/{chatId}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the AppUser that is going to be created.
      chatId - The telegramId of the AppUser that is going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the relation was created, a 404 if the AppUser was not found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping(value="/update", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> updateUser​(@RequestBody AppUserDTO user)

      Update an AppUser on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/update

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      user - The AppUser that is going to be updated.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was updated or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • removeLocalizedNotificationFromUser

      @PutMapping("/remove/{username}/{channelName}/{notificationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppUser> removeLocalizedNotificationFromUser​(@PathVariable java.lang.String username, @PathVariable java.lang.String channelName, @PathVariable long notificationId)

      Update an AppUser's localized notification list for an specific channel.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/remove/{username}/{channelName}/{notificationId}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the AppUser that is going to be updated.
      channelName - The name of the Channel that is going to be updated.
      notificationId - The id of the Localized Notification that is going to be removed from the user's list.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was updated or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> deleteUserById​(@PathVariable int id)

      Delete an AppUser based on its ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/delete/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the AppUser that is going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was deleted or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping(value="/delete", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> deleteUser​(@RequestBody AppUserDTO user)

      Delete an AppUser from the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user/delete

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      user - The AppUser that is going to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was deleted or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.
